pr_title: Prevent bees loading chunks checking hive position

timeline.message: Prevent bees loading chunks checking hive position

timeline.author: Spottedleaf
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,21 @@
+From 535355579a76b7368330a1310159d5ad94aabbb0 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: William Blake Galbreath <Blake.Galbreath@GMail.com>
+Date: Sun, 5 Jan 2020 17:24:34 -0600
+Subject: [PATCH] Prevent bees loading chunks checking hive position
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityBee.java b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityBee.java
+index fb1c0a96..8b5d34b2 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityBee.java
++++ b/src/main/java/net/minecraft/server/EntityBee.java
+@@ -386,6 +386,7 @@ public class EntityBee extends EntityAnimal implements EntityBird {
+         if (!this.hasHivePos()) {
+             return false;
+         } else {
++            if (world.getChunkIfLoadedImmediately(hivePos.x >> 4, hivePos.z >> 4) == null) return true; // Paper - just assume the hive is still there, no need to load the chunk(s)
